_project.name: Hundo EX MGR IST DIC
_project.description: Hundo EX Movement Glitch Restricted with IST and DIC

_Material<Heart Vessel, 3>.notes: This is here just for counting purposes.

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch>.notes: Side jump away from Old Man to avoid the forced dialog.

Glitch Setup: (==) Continue with the route as normal, but do not collect any of the following- Fire, Ice or Bomb Arrows, Korok Seeds.
(==) To save time later, pick up all materials in the order listed to avoid having to reorder the inventory before doing the glitch.

_Material<Flint>.notes: Needed to make fire for Farosh farming.

_Chest<Silver Rupee>.notes: Dog treasure; get rid of any remaining peppers

_Equipment::Weapon<Woodcutter's Axe>.notes: Pick up a new axe and don't use it. Needed for the glitch.

_Material<Wood, 2>.notes: At least 2, can be more. Drop and pick up if not at the end of inventory.

_Equipment::Weapon<Edge of Duality>.notes: To sneak strike the black lizalfos in Faron.

_Equipment::Bow<Royal Bow>.notes: Don't use; At this point you should have at least FDBx2, RGB, RB

Kill Guardian Stalkers.notes: 2 of each Spring, Shaft; 3 screw; 1 core

Outskirt Stable.notes: Pick up Epona and head to Kaya Wan

Visit grocery store.notes: Pick up anything needed for scrap

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Impa/インパ>.comment: Seek Out Impa/インパを訪ねて

_Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: Shield of the Mind's Eye (Optional); Opal (Required)

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch>.notes: Optional if you already have one; Needed for blue flame after glitch

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: Optional if you already have one; To take care of Nebb's first weapon before glitch

_Equipment::Weapon<Woodcutter's Axe>.notes: Optional; A new axe for max arrows in glitch

_Material<Shard of Farosh's Horn>.comment: フロドラの角のかけら

Glitch Setup: Drop Endura Carrot, Farosh's Scale, Horn, Claw
Pick up Farosh's Scale, Horn, Claw, Endura Carrot
Throw away any Flint or Luminous Stones

Kill Black Lizalfos.notes: Use Royal Guard's Bow or sneak strike; Do not pick up fire arrows

_Material<Lizalfos Tail, 1>.comment: リザルフォスのしっぽ

_Npc::SheikaMale<Nebb/ナブ>.comment: The Weapon Connoisseur/幼き武器マニア
_Npc::SheikaMale<Nebb/ナブ>.notes: Show him the Traveler's Sword so you can get it out of your inventory.

Weapons - Torch, Axe.notes: Drop all weapons other than torch and axe. Make sure axe is unused and in slot 2.

Bows - 2 x FDB, 2 x any bow.notes: Must have only 4 bows, 2 must be FDB

Armor - No armor.notes: Must not have any armor in inventory

Materials - Confirm the order.notes: See this link for the order -

Food - No food.notes: Eat any cooked food; must have no food in inventory

Key Items - Sort.notes: Sort key items so that spirit orbs are last

Perform the Glitch: (==) Avoid autosaves until finished with the glitch

Dupe another FDB.notes: Optional; Keep the Royal Bow for 6000 Ancient Arrows

Drop+Pick up top 5 slots.notes: This combines the stacks and moves them to the end of the inventory

Perform the Glitch: Turn in 8 spirit orbs for 2 stamina vessels

Turn in all spirit orbs for stamina then.notes: Should have 23 hearts at the end

_Cook<Speed Food>.notes: 4 Fleet-Lotus Seeds, Farosh Horn; if raining go to Link's cook pot

Drop+Pick up Hyrule Bass x 2.notes: Both stacks at the beginning of the inventory

Perform the Glitch: Drop+Pick up Endura Shroom, Farosh Claw
Drop+Pick up Honey, Farosh Scale, Claw, Endura Shroom
Drop+Pick up Ancient Screws, Endura Carrots

Equip Weapon 2, Bow 4, Shield 1.notes: Axe, unused FDB (or Royal Bow), Shield with at least 10 durability

Save+Reload.notes: Ancient Arrows and Ancient Cores should now be corrupted

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Clavia/クレーヴィア>.comment: Secret of the Cedars/三本杉の秘密
_Npc::SheikaFemale<Clavia/クレーヴィア>.notes: If raining, talk to her at the end of the run

Save+Reload.notes: Shock Arrows, Wood, Beetle, Opal, Lizalfos Tails, Hearty Bass should now be corrupted

Sort Key Items.notes: If more speed/stam food is needed

Save+Reload.notes: Will give 4 speed food and 2 stamfood; If needed, repeat sort Key Items, Save+Reload up to 3 pages of cooked food.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Medda/シモツケ>.comment: The Spring of Wisdom/ラネール山のお宝を探れ！

Get blue flame.notes: put square bomb down in front of you; press Y; FAST press B -> (left dpad); unequip shield; pick up bomb; throw bomb

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Purah/プルア>.comment: Locked Momentos/ゼルダの道しるべ
Robbie's Research/もう一人の研究者
Slated for Upgrades/解放 さらなる力

_Shrine::ChaasQeta.notes: Climing gear; Use Stasis+ and spam ancient arrows or shock arrows with FDB.
